compliant.section: 蒐集之資訊內容及蒐集方式
compliant.legal provisions: The policy clearly states the types of information collected and the methods of collection, which aligns with the requirements for transparency and purpose limitation.
The policy outlines the purposes for which personal data will be used, ensuring that data processing is limited to specified purposes.

compliant.section: 請求製給複製本、請求補充或更正、請求停止蒐集、處理及利用、請求刪除
compliant.legal provisions: The policy provides users with rights to access, correct, and delete their personal data, which is in compliance with user rights provisions.
The policy acknowledges additional rights for California residents, which aligns with specific regional legal requirements.
The policy specifies compliance with local laws in Taiwan, ensuring adherence to regional data protection regulations.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy mentions the use of cookies but does not provide sufficient information on how users can manage their cookie preferences or the implications of consent.
non_compliant.amend: Include detailed instructions on how users can manage cookie settings and the consequences of not consenting to cookie usage.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy states that device information may be collected but lacks clarity on the specific purposes for which this information will be used.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the purposes for collecting device information and ensure that users are informed about how this data will be utilized.

non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy mentions sharing personal data with third parties but does not specify the criteria for selecting these third parties or the safeguards in place.
non_compliant.amend: Provide more details on the criteria for third-party sharing and the measures taken to protect user data when shared.
